items.text: short, ducked under

items.text: back of a length, keeps a little low, opens the face to point
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: shorter and outside off, punched past the bowler off the back foot

items.text: sliding on off, defended into the covers
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: darted into the pads, knocked away to the midwicket region from the crease
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: short of a length on middle, stabbed away to mid-on off the back foot
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: tossed on middle stump, smoothly driven past the left of the bowler to long-on
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: flatter on leg stump, blocked back
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: pushed through on middle and leg, presses forward and works it away to midwicket
items.shortText: Samiullah Shinwari to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: length ball on middle, stroked to right of midwicket
items.shortText: Samiullah Shinwari to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: dragged down outside off, hacked back to the bowler off the back foot
items.shortText: Samiullah Shinwari to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: short and outside off, hangs back and fetches a single down to long-off
items.shortText: Samiullah Shinwari to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: Shahzad drops a tough catch. Fizzes through outside off, Mahmudullah chops and snicks it, but the ball bursts through the gloves of the keeper. Such chances stick or they just dont
items.shortText: Samiullah Shinwari to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: darted on middle, Shakib flubs a pull to mid-on
items.shortText: Samiullah Shinwari to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: back of a length and angling across off from round the stumps, hit back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: nurdled off the pads to the right of midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: fired across off, steered off the face to backward point
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: driven against the angle to midwicket off the front foot
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: short and skidding away outside off, Mahmudullah has a crack at this... and misses
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: full and angling across off, Mahmudullah opens the face and glides a single in front of square on the off side
items.postText: Vishal is back for another spell
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: a half-tracker with the seam up, really poor delivery and it gets the treatment by being pulled away nicely to the midwicket boundary
items.shortText: Samiullah Shinwari to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs

items.text: outside off and he defends the ball carefully
items.shortText: Samiullah Shinwari to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: another poor delivery. Wide full toss and Mahmudullah slays it through the covers but only for one
items.shortText: Samiullah Shinwari to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: a low full toss on the pads, driven on the leg side with the wrists and long on goes to his left to cut it off
items.shortText: Samiullah Shinwari to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs
